original_title: The Earth and Its Peoples: Eskimo Hunters (Northwestern Alaska)
overview: Black and White | 16 mm | ca. 21 min. | Production:Louis De Rochemont | Published by United World Films Inc., New York | Released on DVD from the National Archives of the United States by the U.S. Information Agency, 2008.
